content.text: Welcome! In this lesson, you'll learn how to start a simple conversation about the weather in Italian, a classic icebreaker. Imagine you're at a bus stop and it starts to rain.

data.tip: The 'u' is short, like the 'oo' in 'book'. Roll the 'rr' if you can!

content.title: Opening the Conversation
content.setting: You are at a bus stop next to a stranger, and it starts raining.

conversation_flow.title: Comment on the bad weather
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: *Inizia a piovere. Una signora accanto a te apre l'ombrello.*

content.text: When speaking to a stranger, especially someone older, it's polite to use the formal 'Lei' form. So, instead of 'sai?' (do you know?), you would say 'sa?'.

data.meaning: Do you know the forecast for tomorrow?

data.phrase: Speriamo che ci sia il sole

data.tip: Double consonants like 'pp' are pronounced stronger and held a little longer.

content.title: Discussing the Forecast
content.setting: The conversation about the bad weather continues.

conversation_flow.title: Ask if she knows tomorrow's forecast
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Ah, è vero. Ieri c'era il sole.

conversation_flow.title: Express hope for sunshine
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Mmm, non so. Forse ancora pioggia.

conversation_flow.title: Say you can't stand the wind
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Speriamo! La pioggia va bene, ma il vento...

data.phrase: Questo tempo non è buono per...
data.meaning: This weather is not good for...

data.tip: The 'e' is open, like in 'egg'. The 'cc' is a hard 'k' sound, held a bit longer.

content.text: When saying goodbye to someone who is travelling, 'Buon viaggio' is more specific and thoughtful than a general 'arrivederci'.

content.title: Connecting Weather to Plans
content.setting: You are talking about your plans when you hear the bus arriving.

conversation_flow.title: Say this weather is bad for cycling
Point out that the bus is here
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Ah, peccato! Questo tempo non è buono per andare in bicicletta.

conversation_flow.title: Wish her a good trip
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Oh, bene! È il mio. Grazie.
